```{r r-setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Benchmark code chunks
knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  time = function(before, envir) {
    t <- proc.time()['elapsed']
    if(before) {
      envir$.elapsed <- t
    } else {
      paste(signif(t - envir$.elapsed), 'sec.')
    }
  }
)
```
